review_title: Was a great place to work
pros: Amazing culture. Meaningful work. Great colleagues all striving to make a difference in health insurance.
cons: Didn't get the reimbursements due by the Feds, so stability was a risk.

job_title: Social Media and Digital Strategist in Englewood, CO
pros: I look forward to coming to work just about every day because I'm met by people who are energized by their role and enthusiastic to use their skills. Plus I feel I have honest-to-goodness influence here to improve areas where I see a need, whether it's related to my role or not. We're all working to make things better for health care and health insurance, so it's not about who has the best title. Instead, it's about ideas and passion.
cons: We always could use more hands on deck, but that's the way of a robust start-up! With rapid growth comes the need for much energy and efficiency, and the CO-OP is tackling that along with everything else.

review_title: Great company culture and support system.
job_title: Account Advisor in Colorado Springs, CO
pros: Immediately see and feel that this is an organization that puts their money where their mouth is. They have a strong company culture and exemplary leadership that encourage and support their staff. Excellent recruiting that matches the right people not just on skill level but on best fit that ensures greater job satisfaction and cohesion with the culture. Excellent benefit and compensation with emphasis on work/life balance with lots of support.
cons: You will be hard pressed to find any real issues that can be considered a "con". No job is perfect but this one comes close.

job_title: Senior Director of Accountable Care in Greenwood Village, Arapahoe, CO
pros: Some of the most talented enthusiastic folks I have ever worked with! We get to BUILD it!
cons: We rely on the government system that created us until we can achieve financial independence. It is hard when you know that the company's success is not completely in our control.

pros:
Wonderful work environment, both physically and  socially. 
Provided with top line gear and your fellow co workers are actually very nice.
cons: Not always the most transparent upper level management. But they did try hard to keep employees in the know about upcoming, potentially, company changing events

pros:
Friendly and open minded Management and employees!
Care about members
Fantastic culture and values.

job_title: Senior Account Manager in Denver, CO
pros: work remotely, good location on transit line.
cons: Downside is diversity limitations, can use more structure

pros: Amazing caring company.  so much potential
cons: It is closing business because of the goverment

pros: People first, great mission, awesome marketing
